UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Cell-Selective Pore Forming Antimicrobial Peptides of the Prodomain of Human Furin: A Conserved Aromatic/Cationic Sequence Mapping, Membrane Disruption, and Atomic-Resolution Structure and Dynamics.
Literature.Author: Sinha S, Harioudh MK, Dewangan RP, Ng WJ, Ghosh JK, Bhattacharjya S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=150 µM,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:25% Killing=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-44(MIC=6µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 51625(MIC=6µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=4µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=2µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=4µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=4µM)
